alert.note: Alert for Screven (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 30 at 10:32AM EST until further notice by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Savannah River at Burtons Ferry. * WHEN...From Tuesday evening until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 18.2 feet, the picnic area at Stoney Bluff Landing becomes flooded. Access to the house at the end of Stoney Bluff Landing Road is limited. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 945 AM EST Monday, the stage was 14.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Tuesday evening and continue rising to 16.6 feet Saturday morning. Additional rises are possible thereafter. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. &&
